meanings.definition: A white, crystalline compound used as a pain reliever and fever reducer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed phenacetin for my headache.
meanings.sent2: She bought phenacetin at the pharmacy for her fever.
meanings.sent3: The phenacetin danced on the shelf, ready to help with pain.
meanings.sent4: The power of phenacetin was like a soothing balm for her discomfort.
meanings.sent5: The bright white crystals of phenacetin sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: To treat or relieve pain or fever with phenacetin.
meanings.sent1: I will phenacetin my headache with the medication.
meanings.sent2: She phenacetined her fever by taking the pill.
meanings.sent3: He decided to phenacetin his pain away with the remedy.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to phenacetin her discomfort amazed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The doctor advised her to phenacetin her symptoms with the prescribed drug.
